definition: surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
Yunnan province in southwest China, bordering on Vietnam, Laos and Myanmar, abbr. 滇[dian1] or 雲|云, capital Kunming 昆明
Yunnan Province in southwest China, bordering on Vietnam, Laos and Myanmar, abbr. 滇[Dian1] or 雲|云[Yun2], capital Kunming 昆明[Kun1 ming2]
to gather (in a crowd)/to converge/to swarm
Baiyun district of Guiyang city 貴陽市|贵阳市[Gui4 yang2 shi4], Guizhou/Baiyun district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong
Baiyun district of Guiyang city 貴陽市|贵阳市[Gui4 yang2 shi4], Guizhou/Baiyun district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong
Baiyun district of Guiyang city 貴陽市|贵阳市[Gui4 yang2 shi4], Guizhou/Baiyun district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong
the man (or woman) of the moment (idiom)/influential figure
Miyun town and county in Beijing
Chen Yun (1905-1995), communist leader and economist

sentences.english: Thy Lord knows best, and He has the clouds and the sun at His disposal. --Selected.
sentences.chinese: 你的主无所不知，云和太阳，都受他的使唤与调节。

sentences.english: As of Tuesday, the volcano in Iceland was still erupting, though the cloud was lower.
sentences.chinese: 截至周二，冰岛火山仍在喷发，但火山灰云有所降低。

sentences.english: Inspite of a small set of challenges, cloud provides a powerful platform for testing.
sentences.chinese: 尽管有一些问题，云提供了测试的强大平台。

sentences.english: The azure sky appeared to be so near and the clouds cast their shadows on the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 天很蓝，感觉很近，云在山上落下影子。

sentences.english: But there are trade-offs, and cloud computing is not without its warts.
sentences.chinese: 但是，有得必有失，云计算并非没有缺点。

sentences.english: If did not have the cloud, the sky can be lonely?
sentences.chinese: 如果没有了云，天空会不会寂寞？

sentences.english: Clouds turn red when the sun says good-bye to her;
sentences.chinese: 到了太阳和它们说再见的时候，云就变成了红色。

sentences.english: The sky is getting very cloudy.
The cloud, floating around, like an old man wander the whole world.
sentences.chinese: 云，飘来飘去，就像一位老人云游四海。

sentences.english: The tousled clouds have dispersed from the sky.
Occasionally, the moon and a handful of stars shone through the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 透过那一片片云，间或可以看到月亮和点点星光。

sentences.english: The clouds were such as I never saw before.
Then the magnetic connection between the cloud and the surrounding medium will be broken.
sentences.chinese: 其时云和周围介质间的磁联系就终止了。

sentences.english: But there is something really powerful when voice moves into the cloud.
sentences.chinese: 但是当语音转到云计算下就变成了一股强大的力量。

sentences.english: Clouds play an important role in the global climate system.
sentences.chinese: 云在全球气候系统中扮演着举足轻重的角色。

sentences.english: The cloud metaphor seems more apt.
sentences.chinese: 不过“云”的比喻似乎更合适。

definition: Yunhe county in Lishui 麗水|丽水[Li2 shui3], Zhejiang
fig. high in the clouds/(in the) cloud (computing)
to ride the wind/to use a fair wind/to take an opportunity
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
bright moon/refers to 夜明珠, a legendary pearl that can glow in the dark/CL:輪|轮[lun2]
Baiyun district of Guiyang city 貴陽市|贵阳市[Gui4 yang2 shi4], Guizhou/Baiyun district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong
to perch/to rest (of birds)/to dwell/to live/to stay
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
